name: Swedish Massage
description: Relax and rejuvenate with a classic Swedish massage that uses long, gliding strokes to improve circulation and relieve muscle tension.

name: Aromatherapy Massage
description: Indulge in a therapeutic massage combined with the healing properties of essential oils to enhance relaxation and promote overall well-being.

name: Hot Stone Massage
description: Experience the soothing warmth of smooth, heated stones placed on key points of your body, melting away stress and promoting deep relaxation.

name: Facial Treatment
description: Revitalize your skin with a customized facial treatment that includes deep cleansing, exfoliation, and a nourishing mask, leaving your skin refreshed and glowing.

name: Body Scrub
description: Reveal silky-smooth skin with a gentle exfoliating body scrub that removes dead skin cells, followed by a hydrating moisturizer for ultimate softness.

name: Manicure
description: Pamper your hands with a meticulous manicure, including nail shaping, cuticle care, a hand massage, and a choice of nail polish for a polished look.

name: Pedicure
description: Treat your feet to a relaxing pedicure, featuring a foot soak, nail trimming, callus removal, foot massage, and a wide selection of nail polish colors.

name: Yoga Classes
description: Join our invigorating yoga classes suitable for all levels, promoting flexibility, strength, and inner peace through a series of mindful movements and breath work.

name: Meditation Sessions
description: Embark on a journey of self-discovery and relaxation with guided meditation sessions that help reduce stress, increase mindfulness, and promote mental well-being.
